android.car.hardware.mfd

类 CarMfdManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.hardware.mfd.CarMfdManager

  • public final class CarMfdManager
extends CarManagerBase
    CA-IF
    与MFD模块通信的管理类：接收MFD的数据流，发送数据流给MFD，升级MFD，以及获取MFD升级状态等

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  CarMfdManager.MfdEventCallback 
      static interface  CarMfdManager.PropertyId 

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int ID_VENDOR_MFD_RECV_DATA_INFO
      CA-IF
      接收MFD数据
      数据类型: byte 数组
      FW-GRP-MFD-001_1-F_ORG_P_EXT
      static int ID_VENDOR_MFD_SEND_DATA_INFO
      CA-IF
      发送MFD数据
      数据类型: byte 数组
      FW-GRP-MFD-001_2-F_ORG_P_EXT
      static int ID_VENDOR_MFD_VERSION
      CA-IF
      获取MFD版本反馈
      数据类型: String
      FW-GRP-MFD-001_4-F_ORG_P_EXT
      static int ID_VENDOR_MFD_VERSION_REQ
      CA-IF
      获取MFD版本请求
      数据类型: String
      FW-GRP-MFD-001_3-F_ORG_P_EXT
      static int ID_VENDOR_UPDATE_MFD_CANCEL_SET
      CA-IF
      取消MFD模块升级
      缺省值0
      数据类型: int
      FW-GRP-MFD-001_5-F_ORG_P_EXT
      static int ID_VENDOR_UPDATE_MFD_REQ
      CA-IF
      MFD升级，发送MFD升级文件路径
      数据类型: String
      FW-GRP-MFD-001_6-F_ORG_P_EXT
      static int ID_VENDOR_UPDATE_MFD_STATE
      CA-IF
      监听、获取MFD升级状态
      int32Values[0]：升级状态UpdateState,int32Values[1]：升级进度（0~100）
      数据类型: int 数组
      FW-GRP-MFD-001_7-F_ORG_P_EXT

      • 从类继承的字段 android.car.CarManagerBase

        mCar

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      CarMfdManager(Car car, IBinder service)
      CA-IF
      MFD通信管理类构造函数
      该构造函数不应该由APP直接调用，应该使用Car.getCarManager(String)获取该管理实例

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CarMfdManager

        public CarMfdManager(Car car,
                     IBinder service)
        CA-IF
        MFD通信管理类构造函数
        该构造函数不应该由APP直接调用，应该使用Car.getCarManager(String)获取该管理实例
        参数:
        service - IVI和MFD通讯对应的服务
        car - Car服务

      • registerCallback

        public void registerCallback(CarMfdManager.MfdEventCallback callback)
                      throws CarNotConnectedException
        已过时。 use CarPropertyManager.registerListener(CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener, int, float) instead Implement wrappers for contained CarPropertyManagerBase object
        参数:
        callback -
        抛出:
        CarNotConnectedException

      • unregisterCallback

        public void unregisterCallback(CarMfdManager.MfdEventCallback callback)
                        throws CarNotConnectedException
        Stop getting property updates for the given callback. If there are multiple registrations for this listener, all listening will be stopped.
        参数:
        callback -
        抛出:
        CarNotConnectedException

      • getPropertyList

        public java.util.List<CarPropertyConfig> getPropertyList()
                                                  throws CarNotConnectedException
        Get list of properties represented by CarMfdManager for this car.
        返回:
        List of CarPropertyConfig objects available via CarMfdManager.
        抛出:
        CarNotConnectedException - if the connection to the car service has been lost.

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase
